title: Beetroot pie
description: This recipe is based on the sweet, spicy American pumpkin pie but uses very British beetroot, which gives it an amazing, deep colour and flavour. Serve with crème fraîche.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in loose-based tart tin, 3cm/1¼in deep.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz unsalted butter, chilled, cut into roughly 1cm/½in cubes
350g/12oz cooked and peeled beetroot (vacuum-packed is fine, but not pickled beetroot)
